summary: this elegant one pot reaction furnished the important intermediate 2,3-dioxo-5-arylpyrroles. this reaction will provide different 2,3-dioxo-5-arylpyrroles in reasonable to moderate yields. hydrazine functionalities are also important intermediates for the synthesis of some bioactive compounds such as -lactams. the structures of the hydrazones are summarized in Table 1.
